parameter_description_de: Niederschlag; Verhältnis der homogenen Monatssumme zur Norm 9120
parameter_description_fr: précipitations; rapport de la somme mensuelle homogène à la norme 9120
parameter_description_it: Precipitazioni; somma mensile omogenea rispetto alla norma 9120
parameter_description_en: Precipitation; relation of the homogeneous monthly total to the norm 9120

parameter_description_de: Niederschlag; Verhältnis der homogenen Jahressumme zur Norm 9120
parameter_description_fr: précipitations; rapport de la somme annuelle homogène à la norme 9120
parameter_description_it: Precipitazioni; somma annuale omogenea rispetto alla norma 9120
parameter_description_en: Precipitation; relation of the homogeneous yearly total to the norm 9120

parameter_description_de: Anzahl Tage im Monat mit Niederschlag >= 1 mm homogen; Anzahl Tage bei denen der tägliche Gesamtniederschlag >= 1mm war.
parameter_description_fr: Monthly count of days when precipitation was >= 1 mm
parameter_description_it: Monthly count of days when precipitation was >= 1 mm
parameter_description_en: Monthly count of days when precipitation was >= 1mm

parameter_description_de: Folge von Niederschlagstagen homogen; Maximale Anzahl aufeinanderfolgender Tage pro Jahr mit Niederschlag >=1mm
parameter_description_fr: Maximum number of consecutive days per year with RR>=1mm
parameter_description_it: Maximum number of consecutive days per year with RR>=1mm
parameter_description_en: Maximum number of consecutive days per year with RR>=1mm

parameter_description_de: Längste Folge von Trockentagen (Tagesniederschlagssumme < 1 mm) des Jahres, homogen
parameter_description_fr: La plus longue séquence de jours secs (somme journalière de précipitations < 1 mm) de l'année, homogène
parameter_description_it: La più lunga serie di giorni secchi (somma giornaliera di precipitazioni < 1 mm) dell'anno, omogeneo
parameter_description_en: Longest sequence of dry days (daily total precipitation < 1 mm) of the year, homogenous
